'''House Corbray''' is a vassal house which holds fealty to [[House Arryn]] of [[the Eyrie]].<ref>"[[The Vale (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
sections.Known members:
*Ser [[Vance Corbray]], a [[knight]]
===Ancestors===
*Ser {[[Gwayne Corbray]]}, knight of the [[Kingsguard]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Corbrays are an old but poor house. They hold the [[Valyrian steel]] blade known as [[Lady Forlorn]].

The heraldry of House Corbray in the books is three black ravens in flight, each holding a separate red heart, on a white field. In the TV series continuity (as briefly glimpsed in an animated featurette), it is apparently a single black raven instead of three.
